name: Alice
dialogue: I've always been fascinated by the idea of time travel. Imagine being able to visit different eras and witness historical events firsthand!

name: Henry
dialogue: Ah, yes. The possibilities are endless. But have you considered the potential consequences of altering the past? It could have a profound impact on the present and future.

name: Alice
dialogue: I see what you mean. But I still think it would be incredible to witness important moments in history. Just imagine being there when the pyramids were built or when the first airplanes took flight!

name: Henry
dialogue: Indeed, but we must also consider the potential risks of interfering with historical events. What if we were to change something small and it had a ripple effect that altered the course of history? It's a complex issue, to say the least.
